alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 22 at 12:02AM EDT until September 22 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR WESTERN WYOMING...NORTHERN CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE AND NORTHEASTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 1202 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dunkirk, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden and Orchard Park. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 59. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
